product_description: Built from light, breathable, waterproof mesh transformed from recycled plastic bottles, this court-inspired sneaker is made to make a difference.
product_details_and_care:
Built from light, breathable, waterproof mesh transformed from recycled plastic bottles, this court-inspired sneaker is made to make a difference. Three plastic bottles are kept out of the landfill in the making of one pair of these shoes soled with wild Amazonian rubber.
Lace-up style
Removable insole
Textile and leather upper/textile lining/rubber sole
Made in Brazil
Men's Shoes
Item #5762382
product_size_info: Whole sizes only; for 1/2 sizes, order next size up.
